BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection, Resiliency and Waterfronts

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the replacement of lead water service lines
Items.MatterName: Replacement of lead water service lines.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Department of Health and New York State Environmental Facilities Corporation to fairly allocate grants and loans for lead service line replacement approved in the Federal Bipartisan Infrastructure Law and to remove all rules preventing New York City from receiving a fair share of this funding.
Items.MatterName: NYS Department of Health and NYS Environmental Facilities Corporation to fairly allocate grants and loans for lead service line replacement approved in the Federal Bipartisan Infrastructure Law and to remove all rules preventing NYC from receiving a fair
